headline: Trump May Impose Tariffs on Heavy-Duty Trucks. Some Car Makers Could Get Relief.
summary: A notice in the Federal Register indicates heavy-duty trucks might be subject to the sectoral tariffs that have roiled the U.S. car industry.

headline: 5 Monster Stocks -- Such as Ford -- to Hold for the Next 10 Years
summary: As I write this, the stock market, as measured by the S&P 500 index of 500 of America's biggest companies, is down about 10%.  It's a real estate investment trust (REIT) -- a company that owns many real estate properties, charging its tenants rent.
